name: NTRPG-Skybride
description:
【RPG&Simulation】
10+h RPG main story lane.
40+ girls
60+ actors
30+ side Quests
100 Weapons
300 Armors
100 girl personality
500 Skills
The story world is base on Dragon Quest V, which wife will you pick?

【Manager Your Town】
Upgrade buildings, Equipment, Crafts, Smith and Cook.
Workrooms: increase brothel rooms for girls to work as a whore.
dungeons: train girls Compliance.
Pub: girls work as Bunny Girl.
Cafeteria: food, increase girls mood.
Security: prevent girls from rogues.
Adventure: sent ppl to search items.
Farm: sent ppl work in the farm, get farm produce.
Mining: sent ppl work on mine, get stone, Iron...
Casino: earn money and play games in the casino.
Garden: change garden views and increase reset places.
SPA: reset place, increase girl's mood.
Weapon Shop： new weapons
Armor Shop: new Armors
Item Shop: new items

love system: talk, gift, assign jobs, increase their love value.
find their story and make love.


【SRPG battle system】
9 actors VS 100 enemies!! defense your Castle!!
4 actors when RPG adventure
Notes: This idea is 5 years ahead than "Fire Emblem: Three Houses"
